articles.title: U.S. weekly jobless claims fall; fourth-quarter growth revised up - Reuters
articles.description: The number of Americans filing new claims for unemployment benefits dropped to a one-year low last week, providing a powerful boost to an economy on the verge of stronger growth as the public health situation improves and temperatures rise.
